ygData.subject: Re: 7th Coldain Prayer Shawl
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats Su, that is a huge acclomplishment. Good luck on #8. I just got #4 today for my wiz, finally got off my lazy arse to finish it. ... items, and ...
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats Su, that is a huge acclomplishment. Good luck on #8. I just
got #4 today for my wiz, finally got off my lazy arse to finish it.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
> WOOOOOOOOOOOOHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
> After a long long long time of working on my skills, farming the
items, and
> spending almost all of my money... I finally did it!
> I failed a combine a couple times and lost two runed sea shells
(which were
> the most expensive thing I had to buy for it-- I tried hunting in
SG but
> didn't have any luck). I got my JC to 173, my tailoring to 176,
fletching to
> 180, brewing to 184, pottery to 154, and smithing to 112. I got
impatient on
> the pottery and just asked someone to put the water and the velium
powder
> (made from the runed sea shell and a small brick of velium in a
mortar and
> pestle-- no fail combine) in a pottery wheel and got my Unfired
Rune. I
> fired the rune. I bought a geerlok gemsetter. Borrowed a geerlok
planing
> tool for my fletching for the combines. and borrowed a geerlok
sewing kit
> for the final combine. Had C3 on and success!!
> I now have my Runed Coldain Prayer Shawl!
> Now I need to work on JC and Smithing some more for my 8th shawl...
> luv,
> -Su
>
>
> ---
